Class ConfiguracaoISPD

java.lang.Object
ispd.arquivo.xml.ConfiguracaoISPD
public class ConfiguracaoISPD extends Object
Responsible for reading and updating the software's configuration file

    • ConfiguracaoISPD

      public ConfiguracaoISPD()
